regen.absent_element: removal or update of existing passwords for staff members
regen.new_specification: The system shall allow the removal or update of existing passwords for staff members in the Configuration option.

regen.absent_element: notification or handling of conflicting entries after analysis
regen.new_specification: The system shall provide a mechanism to resolve conflicts identified during data analysis before storing in the database.

regen.absent_element: warning for potential data loss or system instability when modifying database tables
regen.new_specification: The system shall alert the system administrator of potential data loss or system instability when modifying database tables and provide an option to confirm or cancel the changes.

label: The configuration option shall allow a security level and password to be assigned to each defined staff member.
absence: a password to be assigned to each staff member
